name: Sweet Bacon Crackers
author: ~Jen~
summary: Butter crackers are baked with bacon and brown sugar to make a delicious snack.
ingredients: 36  buttery crackers such as Keebler Club® Crackers
¾ cup packed light brown sugar
directions: Preheat the oven to 250 degrees F (120 degrees C)
Line two rimmed cookie sheets with aluminum foil
Arrange crackers on the prepared cookie sheets in a single layer
Place a piece of bacon on top of each cracker, then put about a teaspoon of brown sugar on top of the bacon
Bake in the preheated oven until bacon is browned and crackers and bacon are glazed, about 45 minutes
Drain on paper towels before serving
